translations.translation: Or is the Unseen in their hands so they can write out what is to happen?
Or do they have knowledge of the Unknown which they write down?
Or is it that they have access to (the Truths in) the realm beyond sense-perception which they are writing down?
Do they have knowledge of the unseen, thus, are able to predict (the future)?
Or is the hidden with them, by which they pass judgements?
Or that the Unseen is with them, and they write it down
Or have they the unseen so that they write (it) down?
Or is the Unseen in their keeping, and so they are writing it down?
Or possess they the Unseen so that they can write (it) down?
Do they possess knowledge of the unseen, so that they can write it down?
Is with them the Unseen, and they write it down!
Do they have [access to] the Unseen, which they write down?
Or that the Unseen in it their hands, and they write it down?
Or that the Ghaib (unseen) is with them, and they write it down?
Or, is the Unseen in their keeping, so they are writing it down?
Or do they know the future, and they are writing it down?
Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

[52:41] Or do they have [access to] the Unseen, that is, the knowledge of it, so that they can write it down?, and are hence able to dispute with the Prophet (s) regarding the Resurrection and the matters relating to the Hereafter, as they claim.

(Or possess they the Unseen) and therefore know that they will not be resurrected (so that they can write (it) down?) that is to say, or do they have a book in which they write whatever they will from the Guarded Tablet, such that they write down what they say and do?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ } معناه يُخبرون

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: أينكرون رسالتك بمقتضى قرائحهم، ومن تلقاء أنفسهم { أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ } أي: لوح القضاء المثبت فيها جميع الأشياء { فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ } [الطور: 41] المغيبات منها؟!
